title: Warwick visual
body: The next visual should be Warwick since he lacks the look of a real werewolf with his lower body being much smaller than his upper body which looks quite weird so I feel he could be so much more with his look and possibly a change of abilities plus with Vlad being a vampire there should be something going on there like a vampire {{champion:8}}  vs werewolf {{champion:19}}  thing :)

replies.body: Warwick is getting a rework that will be visual and gameplay.
No specific date. But after Ryze and Yorick rework.
